author: Special Correspondent
text:
Days after an 18-year-old girl pursuing engineering course was murdered near Arumbavur, the accused S. Prakash surrendered before the Judicial Magistrate court at Karaikudi in Sivaganga district on Thursday.

Special teams probing the murder case were in search of the accused who escaped after allegedly strangulating A. Kanimozhi to death in a tiled house surrounded by farm lands at Vijayapuram near Arumbavur in the district on Monday night. Even as the hunt for Prakash (25) was under way, the accused surrendered before the Judicial Magistrate court at Karaikudi on Thursday morning. Subsequently, he was sent to Tiruchi Central Prison.
title: Accused in murder surrenders
